7 template <typename T>
8 CircularBuffer<T>::CircularBuffer()
9 : index_write(0), len_buffer(1024), wrap_mask(1023)
10 {
11 }
12
13 template <typename T>
14 void CircularBuffer<T>::clear() { memset(&buffer[0], 0, len_buffer * sizeof(T)); }
15
16 template <typename T>
17 void CircularBuffer<T>::init(unsigned int num_samples)
18 {
19 init_power_of_two((unsigned int)(pow(2, ceil(log(num_samples) / log(2)))));
20 }
21
22 template <typename T>
23 void CircularBuffer<T>::init_power_of_two(unsigned int num_samples_power_of_two)
24 {
25 index_write = 0;
26
27 len_buffer = num_samples_power_of_two;
28
29 wrap_mask = len_buffer - 1;
30
31 buffer.reset(new T[len_buffer]);
32
33 clear();
34 }
35
36 template <typename T>
37 void CircularBuffer<T>::push_sample(T input)
38 {
39 buffer[index_write++] = input;
40
41 index_write &= wrap_mask;
42 }
43
44 template <typename T>
45 T CircularBuffer<T>::read(int samples_delay)
46 {
47 int index_read = (index_write - 1) - samples_delay;
48 index_read &= wrap_mask;
49
50 return buffer[index_read];
51 }
52
53 template <typename T>
54 T CircularBuffer<T>::read(double samples_delay_fractional)
55 {
56 T y1 = read((int)samples_delay_fractional);
57 T y2 = read((int)samples_delay_fractional + 1);
58
59 double fraction = samples_delay_fractional - (int)samples_delay_fractional;
60
61 return mappings::map_linear_norm(fraction, y1, y2);
62 }
